ingredients.ingredient: 1 bunch flat-leaf kale - ribs trimmed away and discarded and leaves cut into 2-inch pieces
1 tablespoon olive oil, or to taste

cookingTips: Pat kale completely dry with paper towels to remove all moisture before cooking
Toss kale lightly with oil to coat evenly without making pieces soggy
Microwave in batches for 3-5 minutes, checking frequently as cooking time varies by microwave power
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user on achieving crispy chips without burning by explaining the importance of dry kale and monitoring during cooking.
